transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Ji, good evening, sir.
Customer: Good evening.
Executive: Sir, Ankit baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se. Abhi call kiya tha aapne customer care pe. Meri baat hui hai sir, main thoda ek call pe busy tha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan. Sir, maine woh hamare platform pe kaun se product hai?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Yeh agar send kiya toh achha hoga.
Executive: Matlab kya karna hai?
Customer: Hamare platform pe, hamara jo platform hai na IndiaMART mein.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Woh platform pe kaun kaun se product hai, uska woh picture send kar do na mujhe.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul, main kar deta hu. Abhi yeh batao aapne kaha tha sir, main yeh pura na ek PDF send kar de raha hu, thik hai? Kaun kaun se aapke product hai, thik hai?
Customer: Haan, barabar barabar barabar.
Executive: Haan. Plus mujhe ek cheez aur batao, aapne kaha tha ki aapke aap mujhe baat karayenge, thik hai? Jo service aapke bete ki jagah pe use karenge. Toh phir woh toh phir aage baat aage badh hi nahi paayi sir.
Customer: Thik hai, raat ko call karu?
Executive: Raat mein kitne baje?
Customer: Raat mein 9:00 baje.
Executive: 9:00 baje toh sir late ho jayega. Main last 7:00 baje tak available reh sakta hu. Woh raat mein main bhi jaise kabhi kabhi kya hota hai ki na sir family ke saath hota hu toh miss ho jata hai call. Haan haan, barabar.
Executive: Main aapko na, hmm, yeh WhatsApp pe bhej raha hu aapko, thik hai?
Customer: Haan woh bhejo sir please.
Executive: Okay. Dekho pura catalog ka link bhi daal de raha hu, thik hai? Aur catalog ka woh jo jo pura brochure hai woh main daal de raha hu aapke liye, thik hai? Okay sir.
Executive: Hmm. Dusra ek cheez aur bataiye.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Yeh jo product hai ek baar aap mobile open karoge na toh dekhiye ek baar. Isme mujhe yeh batana sir ki abhi kaun kaun se product hamare paas available hai, thik hai? Jisme main aapki help kar pau. Aapne IndiaMART app login kara hai phir?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Aapne IndiaMART app login kiya hai?
Customer: Haan, woh bacche ke mobile mein hai na, Chetan ke mobile mein.
Executive: Achha, toh Chetan wala phone kiske paas hai abhi?
Customer: Ghar pe rehta na.
Executive: Ghar pe abhi kaun uthayenge agar call lagau toh main?
Customer: Nahi, aage koi nahi uthayega.
Executive: Achha, call koi nahi uthayenge? Bhai yeh aadha ghante ke baad jaake main hi uthaunga.
Executive: Toh main 6:00 baje call kar lu toh baat ho jayegi aap se us number pe?
Customer: Haan ho jayegi, ho jayegi.
Executive: Toh 6:00 baje phir yeh batao aapne toh kaha ki main padha likha nahi hu, main nahi chala paunga, thik hai? Toh kisi ko aap available karaoge toh kiske baat hogi phir yeh batao?
Customer: Aap, aap 6:00 baje call karo, main uthata call.
Executive: 6:00 baje?
Customer: Haan, 6:00 baje.
Executive: Thik hai, 6:00 baje main call karta hu. Ab yeh bataiye is number pe WhatsApp chal raha hai na jisse baat ho rahi hai aap se?
Customer: Haan haan, WhatsApp hai.
Executive: 9822427443.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Thik hai, is number pe hai, thik hai? Ispe dala hua hai pura product ka jaise brochure hota hai na IndiaMART pe kitne product hai, har cheez ke solar ho gaye, zyada tar electrical item hai, thik hai? Battery ho gaya, thik hai? Inverter ho gaya, solar inverter ho gaya, thik hai? Aur apna DC DB box ho gaye, switch ho gaye, thik hai? Toh yeh sara product ispe pada hua hai. Aur dusri cheez, aapko agar aapko kabhi jaanna ho na ki aapke product internet pe kya kya pada hai, thik hai? Toh aap direct Google pe jaake aap apni company ka naam dal sakte ho.
Customer: Chalega chalega.
Executive: Thik hai? Company ka naam kaise dalna hai woh main bata deta hu aapko. Ek baar main bata raha hu kya naam hai. Company ka naam hai sir, Satvandan Enterprises, thik hai?
Customer: Kya? Satvandan, Satvandan Enterprises and Traders.
Customer: Barabar barabar.
Executive: Yeh naam hai company ka, thik hai? Haan haan. Toh yeh aapko dalna hai. Aur yeh dalenge jaise hi aapka catalog pura open ho jayega, thik hai? Achha achha achha.
Executive: Haan. Toh 6:00 baje main call karta hu sir aapko, thik hai? Uske baad hum log ek baar connect karte hai. Chalega chalega.
Customer: Abhi market mein ho sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aapka Chetan ke Satvandan ke naam se koi company hai, koi dukan hai aapki shehar mein?
Customer: Hai na. Isme photo pada hua tha. Kiska dukan hai woh?
Customer: Apne Chetan ka dost tha.
Executive: Achha, Chetan ke dost hai woh Satvandan Enterprises?
Customer: Haan, nahi, Satvandan hamara hai.
Executive: Satvandan aapka hai na? Aapka hai.
Executive: Haan, yeh kaha pe hai jo aapka yeh sab?
Customer: Shirpur, Dhulia district, Maharashtra.
Executive: Kaun chalate hai woh sabhi?
Customer: Abhi main hi handle kar raha hu.
Executive: Toh usme kya product sale ho raha hai?
Customer: Usme yahi solar panel, apna battery.
Executive: Achha, yahi sab sale karte ho aap? Abhi aap hi baith rahe ho na?
Customer: Haan haan, jo apne platform pe hai na.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Wohi, wohi, wohi selling karta hu.
Executive: Wohi kar rahe ho na? Toh abhi toh main keh raha tha ki isko active kar lete hai dobara, thik hai? 6:00 baje call karunga main aapko. Chalega chalega. Chalega sir. Haan.
Executive: Abhi aadha ghanta hai.
Customer: Okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know products on IndiaMART platform.

- Wants to talk to someone about service.

- Cannot operate the IndiaMART app.



Resolution:

- Executive sent PDF of products on platform.

- Executive will call back at 6:00 PM.

- Executive provided company name for Google search.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call back at 6:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- products, platform, google search, follow-up
